edu.iu.dsc.tws.data.api.out

Class FileOutputWriter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.iu.dsc.tws.data.api.out.FileOutputWriter<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of data to write
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    OutputWriter<T>, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CSVOutputWriter, TextOutputWriter

    public abstract class FileOutputWriter<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements OutputWriter<T>
    Abstract class for writing to file system
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
